'''Katsa''' is an extension that provides spies for injection into code for Lua modules. This makes it possible to report actions clearly and visible, to facilitate interactive and collaborative debugging.

For a full Vagrant setup, see [https://jeblad.github.io/Katsa/topics/vagrant.md.html the documentation].
